sentences.en: At first he studied architecture, but later he switched to geology.
sentences.cn: 他原是学建筑的, 中途改行搞地质了.

sentences.en: Concentrators in geological sciences elect either geology or geography.
sentences.cn: 主修地质学的学生要选修地质学或地理课程.

sentences.en: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.cn: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.en: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Jordan.
sentences.cn: 他是约旦大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.en: I know only a few streaks about geology.
sentences.cn: 我对地质学只是略知一二.

sentences.en: In his lecture on geology, he touched on the subject of climate.
sentences.cn: 他在关于地质学的报告中, 也涉及气候问题.

sentences.en: the geology of the British Isles
the keeper of geology at the museum
sentences.cn: 博物馆地质资料的保管人

sentences.en: The noble science of Geology loses glory from the extreme imperfection of the record.
sentences.cn: 地质学这门高尚的科学,由于地质记录极端不全而损失了光彩.

sentences.en: The remaining minerals are of lesser significance in engineerng geology.
sentences.cn: 其余的矿物在工程地质中意义不大.

sentences.en: The sciences of planetary geology have benefited tremendously from these new finds.
sentences.cn: 行星地质科学从这些新发现中受益匪浅.

sentences.en: The students went to study the geology of that region.
sentences.cn: 学生们去研究那个地区的地质情况.

sentences.en: We have touched upon subjects from a variety of fields of geology.
sentences.cn: 我们已经论及了地质学领域中提出的各种问题.

sentences.en: Well logging transcends the boundaries ordinarily established between geology, geophysics, and petroleum engineering.
sentences.cn: 测井超越了通常在地质 、 地球物理和石油工程中划定的界线.

trans.tran_cn: 地质学，（某地区的）地质情况，地质学的著作
trans.tran_en: the study of the rocks, soil etc that make up the Earth, and of the way they have changed since the Earth was formed
